title: A dedicated community of gamers is racing to complete every uncleared level...
content:
A dedicated community of gamers is racing to complete every uncleared level in Super Mario Maker before Nintendo shuts down the Wii U servers on April 8. Theyâ€™ve cleared thousands of levels and are down to 1 particularly thorny level.
